nodes.bodyText:
does this need to go into a common location?
I feel like you already extracted this code in another PR.
why change the format here and not in any of the other strings?

thanks for adding this, please use an issue number to track remaining work instead of your name.
This way we would have an external representation of the tech debt that we need to address.

nit: I get what you are trying to do here, but this is not the right approach.
The best way to make logs abstract and consistent is to wrap the logger and add additional fields there. These log constants are actually polluting the controller and distracting from the main functionality of the class which is controller logic.
Please either move them to a logger util or revert back to duplicated strings for now.
you are introducing yet another dependency between tests by using a value created in the previous test here.
Ideally tests should not have a fixed order of execution.
